alert.note: Alert for Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 08 at 3:02AM MST until January 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches possible across the southwestern corner of the Park. Generally 3 to 6 inches expected elsewhere. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Yellowstone National Park. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, including in the backcountry. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The worst conditions are expected Tuesday afternoon through early Wednesday morning. See weather.gov/riverton/winter for more details on snow potential.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
